Package CPS

Class Street

  • java.lang.Object
    • CPS.Street
  • public class Street
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a city with a two sided street. Has Read/Write and a View mode. Stores buildings as an AbstractBuilding object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Street.AbstractBuilding
      Abstract class to be the super class of every building object in the street.
      static class  Street.Mode
      Enum to represent the modes of the program
      static class  Street.Side
      Enum to reoresent the sides of the streets

      default constructor

      a constructor that takes the length.
